content.text:
# Critics' Choice Television Award for Best Unstructured Reality Show

'''The Critics' Choice Television Award for Best Unstructured Reality Show''' is one of the award categories presented annually by the Critics' Choice Television Awards (BTJA). In 2016, the category Best Reality Series was separated into two categories â€“ Best Unstructured Reality Show and Best Structured Reality Show. The winners are selected by a group of television critics that are part of the Broadcast Television Critics Association.
